name: MQ Channel Outage Intact

query.text:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "channel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel"] == "TCP.WG70P1.INTACT.01")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn:(r) => r["_value"] != 3)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: count)
query.name: mqchanintnotrun

statusMessageTemplate: Check: ${ r._check_name } for Intact is: ${ r._level }
